description:
With the Mino ware contest under her belt, Himeno finally feels like she`s arrived at the starting line for the path of pottery.
While she is talking to her friends from the pottery club about the next, even more wonderful thing to make, a visitor with a typhoon-like energy bursts into their club room...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Go! Down the Path of Pottery
Machen wir uns auf die Socken! Zur Stadt der Keramik
歩き出そう! 焼き物の町へ
